text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem epa-medicationstatement-processing-event-code

This case-sensitive code system https://gematik.de/fhir/epa-medication/CodeSystem/epa-medicationstatement-processing-event-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (Deutschland) (German (Germany), de)
LINKING_NOT_SUCCESSFUL eMP linking not successfulMedicationStatement could not be linked to an eMP-Entry successfullyFehlerhafte eMP Zuordnung
UNLINKING_NOT_SUCCESSFUL eMP unlinking not successfulMedicationStatement could not be unlinked from an eMP-Entry successfullyFehlerhafte Aufhebung der eMP-Verknüpfung

name: EPAMedicationStatementProcessingEventCodeCS
title: EPA MedicationStatement Processing Codes
description: Codes that define events that occur during processing of an EMPMedicationStatement

concept.definition: MedicationStatement could not be linked to an eMP-Entry successfully
